section.name: Command Line Arguments
section.p: Here are the command line arguments.
section.source: USAGE start-attachment.sh -unsent /path/to/directory/for/unsent/attachments -sent /path/to/directory/for/sent/attachments -to "Rita Red <rita.red@somewhere.com>, Oscar Orange <oscar.orange@somewhere.com>" -subject "Attachment email"
section.p: Now that you know the command line arguments, Next is Scheduling.
